meanings.definition: Of or relating to the highest part of the sky
meanings.sent1: The clouds in the heavenliest sky were fluffy and white.
meanings.sent2: The hot air balloon soared through the heavenliest part of the sky.
meanings.sent3: The birds built their nests in the heavenliest part of the sky, enjoying the view.
meanings.sent4: As the sun set, the colors in the heavenliest sky painted a breathtaking picture.
meanings.sent5: The stars sparkled in the heavenliest sky, like diamonds scattered on velvet.

meanings.sent1: The garden was filled with the heavenliest flowers, blooming in vibrant colors.
meanings.sent2: She wore the heavenliest dress to the party, turning heads wherever she went.
meanings.sent3: The aroma of the heavenliest cake wafted through the kitchen, tempting everyone.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was the heavenliest sound he had ever heard, filling him with joy.
meanings.sent5: The sunset painted the sky in the heavenliest shades of pink and orange, a sight to behold.
